title: Tomato and Avocado Bruschetta
introduction: Tomato and Avocado Bruschetta is a delightful fusion that brings together the creaminess of avocado with the refreshing tang of ripe tomatoes. Complemented by the richness of extra-virgin olive oil and the zest of fresh lemon juice, this topping is perfect on crispy Italian bread, making it an exceptional starter for any meal.
ingredients: Salt and freshly ground black pepper

instructions.description: Cut the tomato in half through the stem end. Cut away the core. Squeeze out the seeds and juice. Chop the tomato into 1/2-inch pieces.
In a medium bowl toss the tomatoes with the oil, onion, and salt and pepper to taste. Stir in the avocado and lemon juice.
Place a barbecue grill or broiler rack about 5 inches away from the heat source. Preheat the grill or broiler.
Toast the bread on one side until golden brown, about 2 minutes. Turn the bread and toast the other side, about 2 minutes. Top with the tomato mixture. Serve immediately.
